scenario_text.value:
That last fight was pretty bad. I don’t know
how many more ambushes like that I can take!

Do not fear, Minoru. However many times we
are attacked, I will protect you.

Aw, yeah! It helps to hear you say that,
Falcomon!

And I’m not gonna let it take me by surprise
again. Next time, we get some payback!

Now that’s what I’m talkin’ about! Suddenly
I’m feelin’ a lot better about this!

We can’t just cower here in fear! We gotta
get out there and find Saki and the others!
